name: Sacred Waters
description:
A knight lay paralysed. In less than a day she will be dead. Her only hope is a drink from a sacred spring. 

Sacred Waters is the first One Page Quest for Romance of the Perilous Land: A Roleplaying Game of British Folklore, providing a complete adventure in one page, perfect for a night of gaming. Face redcaps, wolves, a giant and the soldiers of Mordred himself in a fight to rescue a young knight on the brink of death. 

Sacred Waters is suitable for 1st and 2nd level PCs.
